archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Work Order
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Close a Work Order when the manual activities assigned to employees and/or third parties have been completed.

properties.value: The objective of the Close Work Order processes is to: â€¢{T}Close a Work Order when the tasks and work items assigned to employees and/or third parties have been completed. These processes monitor the status of all open work orders, and recognize that a work order is ready to be closed when the status is changed to Complete.
